nodes.documentation:
The DebtKernel is the hub of all business logic governing how and when
debt orders can be filled and cancelled.  All logic that determines
whether a debt order is valid & consensual is contained herein,
as well as the mechanisms that transfer fees to keepers and
principal payments to debtors.
 * Author: Nadav Hollander -- Github: nadavhollander
nodes.name: DebtKernel

nodes.documentation:
Allows contract owner to set the currently used debt token contract.
Function exists to maximize upgradeability of individual modules
in the entire system.
nodes.name: setDebtToken

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address[6] memory,uint256[8] memory,bytes32[1] memory) view returns (struct DebtKernel.DebtOrder memory)
function (struct DebtKernel.DebtOrder memory,address,uint8[3] memory,bytes32[3] memory,bytes32[3] memory) returns (bool)

nodes.documentation: Fills a given debt order if it is valid and consensual.
nodes.name: fillDebtOrder

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address[6] memory,uint256[8] memory,bytes32[1] memory) view returns (struct DebtKernel.DebtOrder memory)

nodes.documentation:
Allows both underwriters and debtors to prevent a debt
issuance in which they're involved from being used in
a future debt order.
nodes.name: cancelIssuance

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address[6] memory,uint256[8] memory,bytes32[1] memory) view returns (struct DebtKernel.DebtOrder memory)

nodes.documentation:
Allows a debtor to cancel a debt order before it's been filled
-- preventing any counterparty from filling it in the future.
nodes.name: cancelDebtOrder

nodes.documentation:
Helper function that mints debt token associated with the
given issuance and grants it to the beneficiary.
nodes.name: issueDebtAgreement

nodes.documentation:
Asserts that a debt order meets all consensuality requirements
described in the DebtKernel specification document.
nodes.name: assertDebtOrderConsensualityInvariants

nodes.documentation:
Asserts that debt order meets all validity requirements described in
the DebtKernel specification document.
nodes.name: assertDebtOrderValidityInvariants

nodes.documentation:
Assert that the creditor has a sufficient token balance and has
granted the token transfer proxy contract sufficient allowance to suffice for the principal
and creditor fee.
nodes.name: assertExternalBalanceAndAllowanceInvariants

nodes.documentation:
Helper function transfers a specified amount of tokens between two parties
using the token transfer proxy contract.
nodes.name: transferTokensFrom

nodes.documentation:
Helper function that constructs a hashed issuance structs from the given
parameters.
nodes.name: getIssuance

nodes.documentation:
Helper function that constructs a hashed debt order struct given the raw parameters
of a debt order.
nodes.name: getDebtOrder

nodes.documentation: Helper function that returns an issuance's hash
nodes.name: getAgreementId

nodes.documentation: Returns the hash of the parameters which an underwriter is supposed to sign
nodes.name: getUnderwriterMessageHash

nodes.documentation: Returns the hash of the debt order.
nodes.name: getDebtOrderHash

nodes.documentation:
Given a hashed message, a signer's address, and a signature, returns
whether the signature is valid.
nodes.name: isValidSignature

nodes.documentation: Helper function for querying an address' balance on a given token.
nodes.name: getBalance

nodes.documentation: Helper function for querying an address' allowance to the 0x transfer proxy.
nodes.name: getAllowance
